sources.title: Chasing Trouble
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Chasing Trouble
sources.description: Taken from IMDB : A delivery boy for a flower shop, who thinks of himself as an amateur detective, finds out that his boss is mixed up with a foreign espionage ring.

sources.title: Chasing Trouble (1940) MANTAN MORELAND
sources.description:
Stars: Mantan Moreland, Frankie Darro, Marjorie Reynolds
Director: Howard Bretherton

 A delivery boy for a flower shop, who thinks of himself as an amateur detective, finds out that his boss is mixed up with a foreign espionage ring.

metadata.Plot: A delivery boy for a flower shop, who thinks of himself as an amateur detective, finds out that his boss is mixed up with a foreign espionage ring.
metadata.Actors: Frankie Darro, Marjorie Reynolds, Mantan Moreland
